pr_title: Extend and refactor sending of validation requests in Utils

timeline.bodyText: validationLink is unused in the later code. Maybe it get mixed with linkLocation in the template?
timeline.author: zlamalp

replies.bodyText: Yes, I used linkLocation instead of validation link. It should be fixed now.
replies.author: stavamichal

replies.bodyText: It remained in defaultBody as directly joined strings. Maybe you should just prepare all replacable strings first and then use placeholders (eg. {link}) also in default template body. This might apply to other mail types too.
replies.author: zlamalp

replies.bodyText:
You are right, it is still in the body. I have replaced that.
If you are using defaultBody or defaultSubject I would prefer to not doing replacements. It is better to have it ready before using.
replies.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyText: Please update javadoc, there is no namespace and id in the method params.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: Please do explicit logging in error mode for that exception. Thank you.
timeline.author: zlamalp

replies.bodyText: Location of the error in the code should be visible from the stacktrace of the passed ex. I would shorten the error message like: Unable to send mail to "email". or something like this.
replies.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: We must append &activation=true so that app for password reset knows, it should behave as an account activation. Or you can handle this in link preparation method.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
Extend and refactor sending of validation requests in Utils

 - new methods:
  - sendAccountActivationEmail
  - sendAccountActivationConfirmationEmail
 - logic is same as for password reset methods just with different text
 templates for body and subject of email
 - refactor code of methods:
  - sendPasswordResetEmail
  - sendValidationEmail
  - sendPasswordResetConfirmationEmail
 - to prevent using duplicates of code and make it easier to use in the
 future
 - for purpose of refactoring, these new private methods were created:
  - prepareValidationLinkForEmailChange
  - prepareValidationLinkForPasswordResetAndAccountActivation
  - prepareValidityTo
  - prepareBodyOfEmail
  - prepareSubjectOfEmail
  - sendEmail
 - all methods are there to prepare environment to work with such
 requests
